articles.summary: Chattanooga officials are working on ways to integrate artificial intelligence into city services. The city recently dissolved its Department of Equity and Community Engagement and moved staff to the Office of Constituent Services in order to comply with new state laws. Chattanooga is currently under a federal consent decree designed to eliminate sanitary sewer overflows into the Tennessee River.

articles.title: AMD's stock is surging as these big numbers excite Wall Street
articles.author: Britney Nguyen
articles.summary: Advanced Micro Devices' stock rose 9% on Wednesday after the company held its first analyst day in three years. The company doubled its outlook for the data-center total addressable market (TAM), which AMD expects to reach $1 trillion by 2030. It also raised its gross-margin guidance to between 55% and 58% in the next three to five years.

articles.title: VeriSilicon and Google Jointly Launch Open-Source Coral NPU IP
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: VeriSilicon has announced the joint launch of the Coral NPU IP with Google. The IP is based on Google's research in open machine learning compilers and enhanced with AI security features. It is designed for always-on, ultra-low-energy edge AI applications, particularly for wearable devices and ambient sensing systems. It's now open-sourced on the Google Developers website and available to developers worldwide. Veri Silicon will offer a commercial-ready, enterprise-grade version of the IP.
